reviews.review: I know this game can have a toxic community but honestly, if you just turn a blind eye and be tolerant, it can be fun, especially with group of friends.
the game is very good i like this game and the perks he let the game very fun like deadhard and drivestrike and i like the killers in the movies like gostface and saw you must buy the game
This game reminds me of Dead by Daylight

Used to love this game, but I can't recommend it anymore. It feels like the Dev's have just given up on "balance" at this point. There is no reason to really use any of the tools or perks to try and fight the killer or even attempt to struggle free. Best you can do is try and hide. Killers are able to mix and match perks to make some god level broken characters.

Although the game has many balancing issues it is still a great game. Every few months a new chapter comes out with new content and the devs continue to work on the game every day.

I probably couldn't play this everyday for multiple hours on end, but I truely enjoy playing it every other day.

nice game but i am sad i baught it one month before it was free :(
It's very fun. Play this latenight with friends, a bit hard to learn tho

I've read reviews that playing now is kind of bad, but as a player who just started now, the matchmaking is okay.
There are a couple of high level players that come across sometimes, but in general it's the same level players with you most of the time. When you play as a solo survivor or as a killer, there are some troll moments but that's normal, can't help but have a fun and laughs with the enemy. So when you play this game, note that you'll get some good and bad games and that's completely normal. You can't be very good at the start of your play, but "every sword is forged from fire". Have fun with this game if you're new ;p.
THE GAME IS SO GOOD SO FUN AND REALLY EASY

DBD is pretty fun at first and when you begin it has a huge learning curve which only adds to the fun after a while you can get burnt out or sick of some of the certain gameplay styles.
Pros: 
Fun with friends
Interesting killers and iconic killers
Fun to learn
Some great cosmetics if you are into that
Constant updates and DLC's
Cons:
Hitboxes and lag are still very hit or miss
Some killers you will just simply not enjoy going against
Clashes of styles some people play for fun and others full on comp (Very opinion based)
Slow and very drawn out updates

The game overall has its pros and cons if you can deal with some moments where you'll get annoyed or upset then I'd say go ahead and try it and if you like games that encourage you to learn to play with certain killers and loop as survivor you'll like DBD. The community can be toxic from time to time but none the less it's still very fun.

this game is very good but I probably should have put 238 hours into studying maybe my grades would be better but at least I made rank 1 : )

Over 300 hours on the different steam accounts I've had and I have to say, At times I hate the game and hate the toxicity in the community but whenever you have people with you it's always so much better, I don't recommend plaything this by yourself BUT if you have people you know you'd play this with then I'd highly recommend it
This is a fun game to play with friends. I don't think it's scary at all but I don't scare easily. It's a good concept for a game though and they made it fun.
Muy buen juego pero le hace falta otra modalidad u objetivos para los sobrevivientes, siempre lo mismo llega aburrir
fun runny and jooky da killer

There are a few weaknesses to this game: 
- generator speeds are so fast that you can skip the game if you have 4 survivors that do gens as soon as possible. Making leaving the game the only option.
- 4 perks aren't enough considering there are 100+ and the only goal of the game is enabling perks, I think it should be 6 or 7 or 8 per player rather than 4 since otherwise there is no insentive to keep playing.
- The game is unbalanced where some killer are overwhelmingly overpowered while others are overwhelingly underpowered, making playing some killers something you never-ever want to do.
- The game is unfun to survivors on the marrets that you have to click and hold one button while pressing another or toggle between 2 buttons to get a small chance of struggle out, which is never ever fun to do.
There are planty of things in the game that should be automatic rather than click based, especialy considering that misstiming a 0.1 second click can result in a game they cannot win.

The good:
+ The stressful game is psycological horror in its finest.
+ The game hook you in to play hundrends of hours.
+ The game is usually fun for survivors. When the survivors aren't very pro, it can be fun to play some killers.

I give this game 6/10 for being a game I really love wasting time in, a time waster game for people who want to waste time. But the game lack game mods, only fix gen, only hunt people while they do gens, lack in options and content, and the game is usually becomes legit unfun when the survivors has flashlights.
Recommanded, but don't expect more than wasted time, there is no learning curve, just chase in circles while getting stunned. So yea, come with low expectations to have the best fun.
it's really fun with friends, and an enjoyable thriller game to enjoy all together, be it with friends or not.

Excellent game! The developers are really creative and constantly are upgrading the game and adding new content. My only gripe would be that a lot of the skins are pretty high priced, but they are purely cosmetic and the actual DLCs are pretty low priced and on sale often, so you're really just contributing to helping the game continue to grow.
